Author: MonetaHawk
Title: [ANN][ICO] MonetaHawk - Set a New Standard in to Crypto Currency Exchanges
Body: MonetaHawk - ICO                    We aim for Monetahawk (MNH) to be the solution to the issues currently facing the industry and set a new standard when it comes to crypto currency exchanges.                                                                                              The main idea of the project is for the possibility of new coins becoming more popular. A professional pool with modern interface, integrated marketplace and functionality all combine for a way to support new coins, and here on Monetahawk everyone can support them. We are committed to develop a platform that will bring cryptocurriencies and blockchain assets to the masses. Users will be able to unlock premium features and receive discounts upto 60% on various fees by utilizing the MNH tokens on the platform. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________                                              MonetaHawk Bounty Campaign   MonetaHawk officially announces its BOUNTY campaign. The goal of BOUNTY campaign is an advertising of Pre-Sale & Crowdsale. To know more about MonetaHawk please visit https://www.monetahawk.net/  The total number of tokens reserved for the company's BOUNTY budget is 0.5 Million MNH Token.  BOUNTY Campaign include five sections that is Bitcoin Talk Signature Bounty, Youtube Blog Post Bounty, Twitter Bounty, Facebook Bounty and Telegram Bounty.                                                                           ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________   BOUNTY TOKEN DISTRIBUTION                      Total Bounty Token         :       0.5 Million                 BOUNTY                               TOKEN%                NO. OF TOKENS                                                                                                Bitcoin Talk Signature Bounty           :   40%                            2,00,000                                                                                        Youtube Blog Post Bounty                 :   20%                            1,00,000                                                                                        Twitter Bounty                                   :   15%                            75,000                                            Facebook Bounty                               :   15%                             75,000                                                              Telegram Bounty                               :   10%                              50,000                                                                                                                            _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________                                                                       BOUNTY PROGRAM TERMS & CONDITIONS   DETAIL OF BOUNTY PROGRAM TERMS & CONDITION GENERAL TERMS •   The bounty campaigns start on the 10th of July, at the moment of creation of thread on Bitcointalk. •   Bonuses earned during the bounty-campaign will be credited to the participants’ accounts within a week after the closing of the Token Sale. •   As a reward for the Bounty activities, you receive MNH tokens. The tokens are allocated gradually to your wallet within 6 weeks after the end of the token sale; •   The Bounty Manager can make slight changes in the Bounty Campaign if deemed necessary; •   Using multi-accounts, cheating, using someone else to do the work and spamming or any kind of unethical behaviour when participating to one of the campaigns are not allowed and will get you disqualified from all bounties; •   Reward system may change if we do not reach desired number of participants. Upto 2500 token) + 5% of ETH Contributed By Referral OR Equivalent Token If Opted.  ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________                                                                                                                        Referral Program  Hello User,  We are glad to announce that MonetaHawk has launched a referral bonus program. To become a part of our referral program you need to share your referral link with friends or followers. If any of them Sign-Up with this link they will be added as your referral. You will get 25 MNH token (max. up to 2500 MNH) per referral activation and also 5% of ETH contributed by him.  Our Pre-Sale/Crowd-Sale referral program is free for joining, it's easy to Sign-Up and requires no technical knowledge.  So here is the matter:  1.  Register by filling up the simple details at our Sign-Up page. After review we will provide you with a unique affiliate link by e-mail.  2.   Save the link and promote MonetaHawk Pre-Sale/Crowd-Sale using this link through E-mail, Facebook, Twitter and Telegram.  3.  For every Sign-Up through your referral link , you will get 25 MNH (max. up to 2500 MNH).  4.  For every ETH|BTC|LTC|BCH contribution from users, invited by you. You will also receive a 5% bonus in ETH.   5.  For example, if a user from your referral link register and contribute 100 ETH or equivalent in BTC|LTC|BCH, you will receive 5 ETH as a bonus.  6.  Attention! All  bonus results will be calculated and paid after the Crowdsale ends. At the moment you should concentrate on bringing visitors to our landing page. The more you bring, the more money you will get!  Your referrals should make contributions from wallets that they specify on dashboard wallet section. We can't track contributions made from different wallets.  Get Your Refer Bonus : https://www.monetahawk.net/referral.php   Simply Sign-Up and Claim Your Free MNH Token: https://www.monetahawk.org/register    [Join Referral Program Now!]   ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________   [Join ICO Now!]

Author: dimon2307
Title: [ANN][ICO] MonetaHawk - Set a New Standard in to Crypto Currency Exchanges
Body: It seems to me that you are offering too large bonuses for investors. This is bad because in the first there is a probability of dumping the token on the exchange, in the second place, investors will not be interested in buying a token at a later stage.

Author: LoraKalash
Title: [ANN][ICO] MonetaHawk - Set a New Standard in to Crypto Currency Exchanges
Body: There is so many new exchanges now... Every of it says that is the best one with outstanding service and so on. Why do you think that your platform will be successfull?
